title: Union Power Minister Manohar Lal Khattar calls on state govt's to make improvements in the sector
description: Union Power Minister Manohar Lal Khattar has emphasized the critical significance of the power sector and urged state governments to enhance their power infrastructure to achieve self-sufficiency. Speaking to reporters, Minister Khattar highlighted the crucial role of state governments in the implementation of power sector improvements.
